name: Smash and Bash Monsters
description:
Beat waves and waves of monsters to get stronger, in this clicker-like adventure!
Before entering each new wave you have to beat the boss from the previous one!



Buy new weapons, on the shop, smash stronger monsters with your new weapons to get stronger loot!



Buy upgrades from the shop to go even further into the waves



Equip your new loot and gadgets to get the edge you need to Smash and Bash the Monsters!
